message.content:
{"id": "124610", 
"title": "Bug 124610: Adding a filter on a boolean computed column causes an error", 
"description": "", 
"OB": "When attempting to add a filter on a boolean computed column, an error occurs.", 
"EB": "Reproduce the issue by saving and previewing the report. Expected result: The filter should work correctly. Actual result: An error is thrown with the message 'data.engine.ConvertToDataTypeError: can not be converted to class java.lang.Boolean.'", 
"SR": "The error should be investigated and resolved to ensure that filters can be added and used correctly on boolean computed columns."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
